302.<voice 00174_00000302><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00174_00000302><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>Oh, Fuura! Welcome home!<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

304.<voice 00405_00000304><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00405_00000304><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>I know that you're still intent
about this, but please, Fuura, try to
be a little more open-minded.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

41429.<voice 00405_00041429><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00405_00041429><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>Don't be so downhearted that you
didn't pass the Trial of Young Leaves! In
fact, it's a good thing that you gave up.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

306.<voice 00533_00000306><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00533_00000306><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>It's your sovereign duty to
follow in Kazayura's footsteps and
become a Wind Rider.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

307.<voice 00642_00000307><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00642_00000307><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I don't want to be a Wind Rider...
and I definitely won't ride an
Azlantelope!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

308.<voice 00747_00000308><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00747_00000308><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>It was an accident, Fuura...
It wasn't the Azlantelope's fault.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

310.<voice 00957_00000310><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00957_00000310><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>Moreover, I've heard that Yokiji's
not feeling very well lately...<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

312.<voice 01148_00000312><start_lip_sync n0:
Fuura. We haven't held the Wind Send-Off Ceremony in this town for six years now.
The winds have stagnated, and the number of complaints by ailing townsfolk has been on the rise.

313.<voice 01190_00000313><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01190_00000313><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>As lord of Azlan, it is my obligation
to select the new Wind Rider to
perform the Wind Send-Off Ceremony.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

317.<voice 01555_00000317><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01555_00000317><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>The same Azlantelopes which were
fond of Kazayura have taken a
liking to you as well.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

318.<voice 01645_00000318><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01645_00000318><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I don't know... I don't like Azlantelopes.
Besides, I'm not...anything special.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

319.<voice 01724_00000319><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01724_00000319><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>There is no one else who shares
your gift. Why won't you consider
using it for the benefit of others?<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

320.<voice 01834_00000320><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01834_00000320><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>Go and cool your head, Fuura. Calm
your heart and think things through.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

321.<voice 02233_00000321><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02233_00000321><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>As you just witnessed, Azlan's
experiencing somewhat of a problem
of late.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

322.<voice 02342_00000322><start_lip_sync n0:
The Wind Send-Off ceremony can't take place unless Fuura agrees to become the Wind Rider.
But it's not like I'm heartless...

323.<voice 02462_00000323><start_lip_sync n0:
I know what I said, but if my daughter continues to stubbornly refuse to carry on our tradition, I'll have to
find another way.

24802.<voice 02586_00024802><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02586_00024802><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>Are you a traveler?
Hmm... I like the look in your eyes.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9224.<voice 02586_00009224><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02586_00009224><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>Have you come from the Garden
of Learning? Then you must
already be familiar with Fuura.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

324.<voice 02664_00000324><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02664_00000324><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>Forgive me, but I must request your
aid. Please see Fuura and ask her
what's on her mind.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9225.<voice 02678_00009225><start_lip_sync n0:
I am ashamed to say that my daughter does not open up to me. But you... You have the eyes of
someone who could bridge that gap.

28555.<voice 02678_00028555><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02678_00028555><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>I'm ashamed to confess that my daughter
has never opened up to me.
But perhaps she will to you.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28557.<voice 02690_00028557><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02690_00028557><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>Fuura's room is just across the hall.
Thank you, and sorry for the inconvenience.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

24614.<voice 00030_00024614><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00030_00024614><start_lip_sync n00256 _normal m00001>Oh, you wish to see my daughter Fuura?<stop_lip_animation n00256 CLOSE_MOUTH>

24619.<voice 00180_00024619><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00180_00024619><start_lip_sync n00256 _normal m00001>Alas, if it's my daughter you're after,
she just left to visit the cemetery.<stop_lip_animation n00256 CLOSE_MOUTH>

326.<voice 00210_00000326><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00210_00000326><start_lip_sync n00256 _normal m00001>Just north of town you'll find
the grave of mistress Kazayura...
Young miss Fuura's mother.<stop_lip_animation n00256 CLOSE_MOUTH>

327.<voice 00260_00000327><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00260_00000327><start_lip_sync n00256 _normal m00001>Whenever she's distressed, she
always goes to that grave.<stop_lip_animation n00256 CLOSE_MOUTH>

24615.<voice 00319_00024615><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00319_00024615><start_lip_sync n00256 _normal m00001>...Hey, you there.
If you have some business with Fuura,
why don't you go to Windy Cape?<stop_lip_animation n00256 CLOSE_MOUTH>

329.<voice 00060_00000329><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00060_00000329><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001><pc>?!
H-help me...!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

331.<voice 01010_00000331><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01010_00000331><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Wh...why did you...?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

332.<voice 01130_00000332><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01130_00000332><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I didn't need your help!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000631.<voice 01230_19000631><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01230_19000631><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I hate you...!! Ah!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000636.<voice 01356_19000636><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01356_19000636><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Cakey... Cakey...
Cakey... Huh?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000637.<voice 01357_19000637><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01357_19000637><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Cakey... My..
My Cakey...?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000638.<voice 01358_19000638><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01358_19000638><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>T... Thank you...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000639.<voice 01934_19000639><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01934_19000639><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>T-that was uncalled for!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

336.<voice 02014_00000336><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02014_00000336><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>If you went after Cakey and died
or something...it'd be a big
inconvenience for me!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

337.<voice 02109_00000337><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02109_00000337><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Just go already!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

338.<voice 02328_00000338><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02328_00000338><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Never thought I'd see you here,
<pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

339.<voice 02388_00000339><start_lip_sync n0:
Oh, congratulations on your graduation from the Garden of Learning. I felt bad because I forgot to
tell you.I was in a rush...

340.<voice 02458_00000340><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02458_00000340><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>U-umm... Who're you?
Come to think of it, I met you

341.<voice 02518_00000341><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02518_00000341><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>So, your name is <pc>.
I'm Fuura, daughter of the lord of Azlan.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

342.<voice 02608_00000342><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02608_00000342><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Just now...that was...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

343.<voice 02668_00000343><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02668_00000343><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>You must've thought I was a horrible
person to act like that towards
the Azlantelope who just saved me.<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

344.<voice 02728_00000344><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02728_00000344><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Heh... You sure are an honest one.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

345.<voice 02728_00000345><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02728_00000345><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Really...?
Thanks. That's really kind of you.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28558.<voice 02781_00028558><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02781_00028558><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>...My mother was one of the greatest
Wind Riders in Azlan's history.
That's why everyone adored her.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28559.<voice 02836_00028559><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02836_00028559><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I can still envision her riding the
Azlantelopes as though she were
dancing, while I looked on from afar...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28560.<voice 02948_00028560><start_lip_sync n0:
I really do wish that I could follow in my mother's footsteps and become a Wind Rider, just like my father
said... But, well...

346.<voice 03059_00000346><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03059_00000346><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>My mother...fell from here and died.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

347.<voice 03337_00000347><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03337_00000347><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>She was trying to save a young
Azlantelope that had fallen from
the cliff and gotten stuck.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

348.<voice 03535_00000348><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03535_00000348><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>If the Azlantelopes never existed,

349.<voice 03924_00000349><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03924_00000349><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>This is...my mother's favorite flower?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

351.<voice 04159_00000351><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04159_00000351><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>So the Azlantelopes left this
as an offering. Even after six years,
they still...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

352.<voice 04292_00000352><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04292_00000352><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I...had forgotten that my mother
liked these flowers...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

356.<voice 04604_00000356><start_lip_sync n0:
I don't know if I'll ever truly like Azlantelopes, but...I wouldn't mind at least performing the Wind Riding.
For the sake of the people of Azlan!

357.<voice 04934_00000357><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04934_00000357><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Thanks for listening, <pc>!
It was kind of refreshing.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

358.<voice 05004_00000358><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 05004_00000358><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I'm going to go tell my father that
I've decided to be the Wind Rider!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

359.<voice 05064_00000359><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 05064_00000359><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>See you later!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

360.<voice 00025_00000360><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00025_00000360><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>Oh, <pc>! I've been awaiting
your return. It seems that you
managed to recall Fuura from Windy Cape.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

361.<voice 00070_00000361><start_lip_sync n0:
I was awaiting her return with the intention of informing her that I no longer had need for her to
become a Wind Rider.

362.<voice 00095_00000362><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00095_00000362><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>But just a few minutes ago, she came
back and told me that she
wished to be one after all!<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

363.<voice 00125_00000363><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00125_00000363><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>I don't know what spurred this
sudden change of heart, but I
couldn't be more delighted.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

364.<voice 00197_00000364><start_lip_sync n0:
Now then. I see that you have a Mark of Adulthood. Are you perhaps traveling
to collect the Key Emblems?

365.<voice 00321_00000365><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00321_00000365><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>In that case, I must yet again
request your aid!<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

366.<voice 00351_00000366><start_lip_sync n0:
For Fuura to become a Wind Rider and perform the ceremony, she must retrieve the two sacred items,
the Wind Reins and the Wind Robe.

367.<voice 00401_00000367><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00401_00000367><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>So there you have it...<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

368.<voice 00451_00000368><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00451_00000368><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>Please aid her in returning the
items safely.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9226.<voice 00471_00009226><start_lip_sync n0:
If you successfully see the Wind Send-Off Ceremony to completion, I shall bestow you the
Green Key Emblem.

9227.<voice 00486_00009227><start_lip_sync n0:
Fuura is already on her way to the mountain pass to retrieve the first sacred tool, the Wind Reins.
If you leave now, you should be able to catch up with her there.

9228.<voice 00516_00009228><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00516_00009228><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>The mountain pass is located south
of Inamino Highway in the South
Azlan Region. Please offer her your aid.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

369.<voice 00415_00000369><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00415_00000369><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001><pc>! Why are you here...?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

370.<voice 00542_00000370><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00542_00000370><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>...I see. My father asked you to come.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

371.<voice 00592_00000371><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00592_00000371><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Hey, <pc>, guess what?!

372.<voice 00622_00000372><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00622_00000372><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Well, the Azlantelopes helped

373.<voice 00672_00000373><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00672_00000373><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>But it just goes to show that
anything's possible!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

375.<voice 00762_00000375><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00762_00000375><start_lip_sync n00257 _normal m00001>Wow, this is amazing.

376.<voice 00812_00000376><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00812_00000376><start_lip_sync n00257 _normal m00001>Seems the young lady is destined to be
the next Wind Rider after all. You're
Fuura from the town of Azlan, right?<stop_lip_animation n00257 CLOSE_MOUTH>

378.<voice 00892_00000378><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00892_00000378><start_lip_sync n00257 _normal m00001>Excellent! Then, please accept the

380.<voice 01090_00000380><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01090_00000380><start_lip_sync n00257 _normal m00001>Now then. Listen closely, young
miss Fuura. You see that
enormous tower over there?<stop_lip_animation n00257 CLOSE_MOUTH>

381.<voice 01145_00000381><start_lip_sync n0:
The other sacred item, the Wind Robe, is in the Sui Tower waiting for a new Wind Rider to come and
fill it with the power of wind.

382.<voice 01175_00000382><start_lip_sync n0:
Only those who are recognized by the tower as the Wind Rider can open the door to the top floor
where the Wind Robe is enshrined.

383.<voice 01205_00000383><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01205_00000383><start_lip_sync n00257 _normal m00001>There, you will be tested
to determine if you are suitable for

384.<voice 01265_00000384><start_lip_sync n0:

386.<voice 01570_00000386><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01570_00000386><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>You're here because my father

387.<voice 01762_00000387><start_lip_sync n0:

388.<voice 01838_00000388><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01838_00000388><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Azlantelopes sure are dumb,

389.<voice 00005_00000389><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00005_00000389><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>We're finally here...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

390.<voice 00169_00000390><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00169_00000390><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Somehow, we made it...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

391.<voice 00273_00000391><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00273_00000391><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Did you help me...?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

395.<voice 00594_00000395><start_lip_sync n0:

397.<voice 00737_00000397><start_lip_sync n0:

398.<voice 00819_00000398><start_lip_sync n0:

399.<voice 00974_00000399><start_lip_sync n0:

400.<voice 01183_00000400><start_lip_sync n0:

19000642.<voice 01284_19000642><start_lip_sync n0:

19000643.<voice 01285_19000643><start_lip_sync n0:

52883.<voice 00204_00052883><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00204_00052883><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>The Wind Robe is in this room, isn't it?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52884.<voice 00371_00052884><start_lip_sync n0:

406.<voice 00809_00000406><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00809_00000406><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>What's with this room...?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

408.<voice 01369_00000408><start_lip_sync m5:

409.<voice 01474_00000409><start_lip_sync m5: <voice 01474_00000409><start_lip_sync m50009 _normal m00001>Wh-what is that...?!<stop_lip_animation m50009 CLOSE_MOUTH>

411.<voice 01684_00000411><start_lip_sync m5:

412.<voice 01784_00000412><start_lip_sync m5:

415.<voice 02164_00000415><start_lip_sync n0:

416.<voice 02214_00000416><start_lip_sync n0:
